name: Pumkin Spice
description:
Press "Trick or treat" to play

I forgot to scale the game properly, so it might not look as intended for other resolutions than 1920x1200 Uploaded a version with fixed aspect ratio after the jam ended

Game made in ~3h for TriJam. I didn't have time for music and sound this time, but I still hope you enjoy it.

Story:

Crazy Demon-Pumpkins are coming straight from the underground! Your only option to fight them back is your candy bucket! Good luck and try to survive!

Please comment your HighScore! :) My was only 20960

Controls:

Left and Right to move, Space to Shoot

Credits:

I used sprite assets from this pack right here: https://cazwolf.itch.io/caz-pixel-halloween 

I used this google font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/VT323

And it's made in Godot Engine

Source code: https://github.com/janisskuja/pumkin_spice

Happy Halloween!
